snippet: Zainab al-Khawaja, an opposition activist in Bahrain who charted the uprising there on her Twitter feed until she was detained this year, has sent an audio message to supporters from prison.
abstract: Zainab al-Khawaja, an opposition activist in Bahrain who charted the uprising there on her Twitter feed until she was detained this year, has sent an audio message to supporters from prison.

headline.main: A Bahraini Activist's Message From Prison

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
